summary: Was thinking about, on the way home, how much traffic changes throughout the day in the real world. I hope that the cities...
question: Was thinking about, on the way home, how much traffic changes throughout the day in the real world. I hope that the cities population fluctuates (traffic and people walking around) based on time of day. Especially since they emphasized that the AI have a set schedule. Would be totally neato
answer:
Ooooh this would be so cool! Even in that gameplay video the city looked so alive! Cities have a huge population, it makes sense that there’d be a lot of people about! So in the morning there’s people in suits going to work and at night there’s clubbers! That sort of thing?

If the population fluctuates, I’m sure that would play a part in a lot of quests!

I’m hype!!

summary: ‘Cyberpunk 2077’ isn’t going to be playable at E3. So you go ahead and forget the fucking idea of getting it this year Cyberpunk...
caption:
‘Cyberpunk 2077’ isn’t going to be playable at E3. So you go ahead and forget the fucking idea of getting it this year

Cyberpunk 2077. I don’t know if it’s going to be good. But, I know I’m worried that CD Projekt Red has so little of the game to show so far.

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 no se podrá jugar en E3 2019, pero se mostrará nuevo gameplay.
title: Cyberpunk 2077 no se podrá jugar en E3 2019, pero se mostrará nuevo gameplay.
body:
#Cyberpunk2077 no se podrá jugar en #E32019, pero se mostrará nuevo gameplay.

El desarrollador polaco CD Projekt Red comenzó a hablar de sus planes para Cyberpunk 2077 en E3 2019. Desafortunadamente, el muy esperado RPG no se podrá jugar durante el show; pero estará en exhibición para que todos lo vean. No hay presentaciones exclusivas a puerta cerrada este año; Incluso el público podrá ver todo lo que CD Projekt Red trae al E3. 

CD Projekt RED daría a conocer la fecha de…

View On WordPress

summary:
Cyberpunk 2077 - V

 So this is V, the cybernetic-enhanced human (if not altogether android) from the upcoming Cyberpunk 2077. ...
caption:
Cyberpunk 2077 - V

So this is V, the cybernetic-enhanced human (if not altogether android) from the upcoming Cyberpunk 2077. V had just been given a new facial upgrade from his previous version. This one makes me thirsty.
